name: INIntent
desc: A request to fulfill in your app or Intents extension.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The unique identifier for this intent object.

items.name: var intentDescription: String?
items.desc: A string describing the content of the intent.

items.name: var shortcutAvailability: INShortcutAvailabilityOptions
items.desc: A set of defined contexts in which an intent or activity might be relevant to a user.

items.name: func keyImage() -> INImage?
items.desc: The most relevant image to display to the user.
